text: Jean-Luc Thérier (7 October 1945 – 31 July 2019) was a French rally driver. He was the highest scoring driver in the inaugural World Rally Championship in 1973. He was the only one to win three events. He was born in Hodeng-au-Bosc, France. Thérier died from a long-illness on 31 July 2019 in Neufchâtel-en- Bray, France at the age of 73.Jean-Luc Thérier est mort ==References== ==Other websites== *Profile of Thérier, Rallybase.nl Category:1945 births Category:2019 deaths Category:French racecar drivers Category:People from Seine-Maritime Category:Sportspeople from Normandy
title: Jean-Luc Thérier
